availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Robinson Miller (Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Henry Miller and Clarissa Miller. Married to Mary F. Curd Miller in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on January 31, 1856. Father of Haiden Curd Miller and Clara Robinson Miller. Student in Jefferson County in 1850. Resident of Jefferson County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville/District 2, p. 177B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hardin County, Colesburg, p. 280A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482708, p. 150.
"Miller," St. Louis Post-Dispatch (St. Louis, MO), January 8, 1908, p. 10.
"George Robert Miller (1830-1892)," Find A Grave, Memorial #157057060, accessed April 30, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/157057060.
KYR-0001-029-0085.
